    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox14009692">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009692">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009692">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Find DVDs and Videos
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content14009692">
          <p>
           Search
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           to find DVDs and videos in the library, as well as streaming video.
          </p>
          <p>
           To find only DVDs, videos, and streaming video, use the Video limit on the left sidebar of your search results page. Many items will be in Trexler Library; note the call number and status of the item to check its location and availability.
          </p>
          <p>
           PLEASE NOTE: Audiovisual materials such as DVDs and CDs held by other libraries are generally not available for interlibrary loan. Such materials at other LVAIC libraries may be borrowed by Muhlenberg students, though, but only if requested by the professor teaching the course in question. Such requests should be submitted by the professor to the Lending Services Desk at Trexler Library.
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt14009692" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile3874371" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox14009693">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="14009693">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title14009693">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Get Help
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content13943779">
          <p>
           Need more help with this?&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/ask-a-librarian.html">
            Ask a Librarian
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           <br />
           Need help with writing?&nbsp; Contact the
           <a href="http://www.muhlenberg.edu/main/academics/writing/center/">
            Writing Center
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt13943779" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
